sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ChakraProvider, Container, Box, Stack, Heading, Text, Center, Button, Flex, Image, Spacer} from '@chakra-ui/react';

const Section3 = () => {
    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Container maxW="1364px" h="1000px" bg="blue.500">
                <Stack direction="column" spacing="30px" justify='center'>
                    <Box mt="200px">
                        <Stack direction="column" spacing="30px">
                            <Box bg="tomato" textAlign="center">
                                <Heading size="2xl">and cashback!</Heading>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Center>
                                    <Text maxW="600px" p="4" bg="red.400" textAlign="center" fontSize="lg">
                                        It saves a little bit of money while you’re shopping, but in many cases it takes ages to get anything out of it. We gave it a thought and made cashback way more friendly. Up to 14% of what you spend using ZEN Mastercard® will materialize on your account right after the purchase. It's like you haggled some cash, despite you didn't have to. Just don't forget to use in-app cashback link.
                                    </Text>
                                </Center>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Center>
                                    <Button size="md" height="48px" width="260px" border="2px" borderColor="gray.700" textColor="gray.700" borderRadius="30px">
                                        Show more partners
                                    </Button>
                                </Center>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box>
                        <Box bg="white">
                            <Flex
                            bg="blue.300"
                            direction={['column', 'column', 'row', 'row']}
                            justify='center'
                            p='4'
                            >
                                <Flex w="200px" justify='center' bg="tomato"><Image src="/Partner/logos-cashback-partners-aliexpress.svg" /></Flex>
                                <Spacer />
                                <Flex w="200px" justify='center' bg="tomato"><Image src="/Partner/logos-cashback-partners-aliexpress.svg" /></Flex>
                                <Spacer />
                                <Flex w="200px" justify='center' bg="tomato"><Image src="/Partner/logos-cashback-partners-aliexpress.svg" /></Flex>
                                <Spacer />
                                <Flex w="200px" justify='center' bg="tomato"><Image src="/Partner/logos-cashback-partners-aliexpress.svg" /></Flex>
                            </Flex>
                        </Box>
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Container>
        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Section3
